exm.mng: God knows..., Who would have imagined...?
lit. who knows, who would have thought, unexpectedly, unpredictably
to whom the deer falls (idiom); the one to emerge victor (i.e. to seize the empire), prize winner, champion

exm.cur: 谁笑到最后，谁笑得最好
exm.trd: 誰笑到最後，誰笑得最好
exm.mng: He laughs best who laughs last.
exm.pyn: shéi xiào dào zuì hòu , shéi xiào dé zuì hǎo

exm.cur: 谁笑在最后，谁笑得最好

exm.mng: He laughs best who laughs last.
